This website is a first minimal version of my personal website. Everything is expected to go through major changes in the coming months. 

## Current position 

Marie-Pierre Etienne is assistant Professor in [Agrocampus Ouest](https://www.agrocampus-ouest.fr/) and specialized in the development of statistical methods for ecology.

On this website, you will find teaching materials and some information on my research. 

## Previous Positions

* Assistant Professor in [Agroparistech](http://agroparistech.fr)
* Visiting researcher in [UBC, Fisheries Center](http://oceans.ubc.ca/)
* Teaching assistant in Unversité d'Evry Val d'Essonne
* PhD student in [Unversité de Lorraine, IECL](www.iecl.univ-lorraine.fr/)
